mapper.insert: insert into giveboard values (giveboardseq.nextval, #{id}, sysdate, null, #{title}, #{context}, #{p_type}, #{end_date}, #{picture}, #{goal}, #{raised}, #{reword}, #{location}, #{act_time}, #{day}, #{v_start}, #{v_end}, #{v_type}, #{field}, #{boardid})
mapper.select: select count(*) from giveboard where p_type = #{p_type}
select * from( select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from giveboard where p_type = #{p_type} order by index_num desc) a) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update giveboard set refstep = refstep + 1 where ref = #{ref} and refstep > #{refstep}
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from giveboard where p_type = #{p_type} order by index_num desc) a) where rnum between #{nowpage} and #{end}
